## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/lazyobjectlinkinglayer">LazyObjectLinkingLayer</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/lazyobjectlinkinglayer">LazyObjectLinkingLayer</a> is an adapter for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/objectlinkinglayer">ObjectLinkingLayer</a> that builds lazy reexports for all function symbols in objects that are/ added to defer linking until the first call to a function defined in the object. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/lazyobjectlinkinglayer/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LazyObjectLinkingLayer is an adapter for ObjectLinkingLayer that builds</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// lazy reexports for all function symbols in objects that are/ added to defer</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// linking until the first call to a function defined in the object.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Linking is performed by emitting the object file via the base</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ObjectLinkingLayer.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// No partitioning is performed: The first call to any function in the object</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// will trigger linking of the whole object.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// References to data symbols are not lazy and will trigger immediate linking</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (same os ObjectlinkingLayer).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
